thing-type.label: 78008 Door/Window Sensor with Magnet
thing-type.description: Door/Window Sensor with Magnet<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtZ-Wave Door/Window sensor with magnet</p&gt <p&gtcan include 2 extern sensors</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gt1. Install the battery and close the lid</p&gt <p&gt2. Set your gateway/controller to the inclusion mode</p&gt <p&gt3. Push the TMP button on the bottom side 3 times in 2 seconds</p&gt <p&gt4. if the inclusion was succesfully the software will show it</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gt1. Set your gateway/controller to the exclusion mode</p&gt <p&gt2. Push the TMP button on the bottom side 3 times in 2 seconds</p&gt <p&gt3. The device is logged off</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtThe Dorr/Window sensor stays in sleep mode for the majority of time. It can be woken up at specified intervals by setting WAKE_UP_INTERVAL_SET command.</p&gt
